remarks: Closure of concatenation with a singleton.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)
statement:
cats1cld.1 $e |- T = ( S concat <" X "> ) $.
cats1cat.2 $e |- A e. Word _V $.
cats1cat.3 $e |- S e. Word _V $.
cats1cat.4 $e |- C = ( B concat <" X "> ) $.
cats1cat.5 $e |- B = ( A concat S ) $.
cats1cat $p |- C = ( A concat T ) $.
